reviews.review_msg: Aaron is a real gem! I thoroughly enjoyed his course for 1.) entertainment purposes (Hoffman is a comedian) and 2.) for his excellent feedback, unwavering encouragement, and focus on teaching useful and transferrable skills in all aspects of writing. I will forever cherish what Hoffman taught me. One of SFU's best.

Given all the good reviews on here I have to say I was a bit disappointed with Professor Hoffman. He is a funny guy and he respects all his students (you're always welcome to voice your opinion in class) but I found him generally quite disorganized and a really tough marker. This is a writing course so expect a lot of assignments.

He will warn you about the amount of writing in the class, don't be surprised. Funny teacher with interesting lectures and a reasonable marker. There was a group project and lots of breakout rooms, I liked that but YMMV. The writing was hard for me, but others may find it different.

Dr. Hoffman is, without a doubt, the best professor that the political science department of SFU has. He will push you to think and write better. He has high expectations for his students but he will help you through the process. He is unreasonably funny and genuinely cares about the success of his students.
